attributes.action: NO TO CYBER STALKING, HARASSMENT & OBSCENE WEBSITES
attributes.additional_details: WHEN VICTIMS ARE CLEARLY TARGETED BY CRIMINAL INTERNET TROLLS, LIVELIHOODS LOST AND LIVES RUINED THE POLICE MUST BE MADE TO TAKE ROBUST ACTION ESPECIALLY WHEN CHILDREN AND FAMILIES ARE TARGETED.

rejection.details: The e-petitions process is designed to allow individuals to raise issues about Government policy. The matter that you have raised is an operational one for the police.
